name: Indian corporate-political nexus
tagline: Construction of a watchdog for Indian corporate and political networks
body:
### ## The corporate political nexus

Ever wondered whom the power stays in the world's largest democracy? 
How the so-called leaders of the country are related to the corporates ( bureaucracy) and vice-versa ? 
 
This project is an endeavour to give answers to these questions. 
Consists of-  
1. _**scrapy modules**_ written to scrape relevant data  
2. _**graph db models**_ to store the information for study  
3. _**web app in flask**_ for disemmination of the data and its visualisations.  
  
   
  
Watch the video to know details - [The corporate political nexus](https://youtu.be/pnta2nG6Qw8)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
